Isophote_Initialize module¶

Isophote_Initialize.Isophote_Init_Forced(IMG, results, options)[source]¶
Isophote_Initialize.Isophote_Initialize(IMG, results, options)[source]¶

Determine the global pa and ellipticity for a galaxy. First grow circular isophotes until reaching near the noise floor, then evaluate the phase of the second FFT coefficients and determine the average direction. Then fit an ellipticity for one of the outer isophotes.

Isophote_Initialize.Isophote_Initialize_mean(IMG, results, options)[source]¶

Determine the global pa and ellipticity for a galaxy. First grow circular isophotes until reaching near the noise floor, then evaluate the phase of the second FFT coefficients and determine the average direction. Then fit an ellipticity for one of the outer isophotes.
